name: Don't Look Down (itch)
description:
Smash bots, dodge spikes, and dash through hidden rooms. Can you save the world from the robot that you created?

Our climbing system is physically immersive (unlike walking in VR with an analog stick) and varied enough to let you play as simple or complex as you want. You can climb slowly and safely, or you can master the art of flinging to speed through levels. You can smash robots as soon as you grab them, or you can throw them at distant enemies to take them both out. You can even grab a robot, fling one-handed towards another enemy, and then smash them into each other!

Please let us know how the game treats you!

Quick survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/FJ6R7HX

Playable on Oculus Rift or HTC Vive
